content: --ग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} difficult of access, inaccessible, impervious, impassable. {2} unattainable. {3} incomprehensible. (--गः, --गं {1} a difficult or narrow passage through a wood or over a stream, mountain &c., a defile, narrow pass. {2} a citadel, fortress, castle. {3} rough ground. {4} difficulty, adversity, calamity, distress, danger; निस्तारयति दुर्गाच्च <ls>Ms. 3. 98</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 43</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 58.</ls> (--गः {1} bdellium. {2} the Supreme Being. {3} <ab>N.</ab> of an {%Asura%} slain by Durgā (thus receiving her name from him). (--र्गा an epithet of Pārvatī, wife of Śiva.
